column2: CoP21 Paris negotiations (power scores based on expert judgements)
Data consolidated on 2 Oct 2015 after extensive interviews with DG Clmate. Ciciero. and input from experts from Earth Negotiation Bulletin and NL gov

column4: CBDR-Respective Capabilities in light of national circumstances
CBDR-Respective Capabilities (with no direct reference to the Convention’s Annexes or Articles referring to those Annexes)
Annexes I and II of the Convention
IAR plus committee on implementation and/or compliance
No binding agreement or binding country-specific targets
Binding agreement plus obligation to have a (nonbinding) country-specific target (NDC)
The above plus obligation on measuring. reporting and verification.
Binding agreement plus binding. country-specific targets.
